episodes.title: Actress Jessica Joan on Leaving the NXIVM Cult
episodes.description:
Actress Jessica Joan details her experience with the NXIVM Cult and talks about her new Freeform docuseries, "How I Escaped a Cult."

Broadcast from New York City featuring a dynamic mix of live and taped shows, “Tamron Hall” airs across the country in national syndication.

episodes.title: Jessica Joan: How I Escaped a Cult
episodes.description:
Actress Jessica Joan talks about her new Freeform docuseries "How I Escaped a Cult" that looks at her four-year battle inside NXIVM.
